dict.acceptation: 表现强烈情感的；令人动情的；易动感情的；感情脆弱的；

sent.orig: The new model involves four factors: emotional perception, emotional assessment, emotional expression emotional regulation.
sent.trans: 这一模型共分为四个纬度，即情绪知觉、情绪评价、情绪表达、情绪调控。

sent.orig: Emotional communication, is an organ of the emotional needs of recurrent acts.
sent.trans: 情感交流，是人的情感器官经常性的行为需求。

sent.orig: Previous theoretical work on emotional labor suggests a negative relationship between emotional labor and job satisfaction.
sent.trans: 以前的研究工作表明情绪劳动和工作满意度之间存在着消极的关系。

sent.orig: If a person is very generous, then he must behave himself an emotional generosity.
sent.trans: 如果一个人很慷慨，那他就必须把自己的慷慨表现得充满感情——马里傲普佐原文。

sent.orig: My father was an intense, emotional, rather quick-tempered man-more of an artist than an engineer.
sent.trans: 我父亲是一个热情认真，好动感情、有点性急的人，他更象一个艺术家而不象工程师。
